Table of Contents

Name

idfXXX - Input Directive File I/O

Synopsis


#include <idfio.h>
Descriptionidfio() presents a set of methods to simplify
running external programs that need a simple parameter file, with a NEMO-like
interface.     Some resemblence to the FORTRAN namelist is made. 
Caveatssome
See Alsorun(3NEMO) AuthorPeter Teuben Files
